basics.name: Mason Daugherty
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I'm a Texan-turned-Mainer, currently studying Computer Science and Digital & Computational Studies on the beautiful campus of Bowdoin College (set to graduate next spring). I have passion for problem-solving and utilizing effective storytelling to simplify complex ideas. Although I dedicated the past few years to refining my skills in media production, my current focus is on navigating our society's evolving digital landscape.

work.name: WBOR 91.1 FM
highlights: Oversee 200+ student & community DJs, supervise station broadcast equipment and facilities
Write detailed engineering documentation of signal-chain, inventory, and internal tools using Confluence
Maintain EAS (Emergency Alert System) logs and routine maintenance, ensuring compliance with FEMA and state regulations
Compile quarterly reports to be submitted on behalf of Bowdoin College to the Federal Communications Commission
Built current website, implementing a high performance now-playing websocket between client and stream
Back-end systems integration and implementation of metadata distribution channels to third-party platforms such as TuneIn Radio and Apple Music
Selected and maintain the station's online stream-hosting platform
Secured all online accounts and profiles by implementing rigorous standards, with the help of a central password manager that I chose and set up (1Password Enterprise - SSO integration with Okta)
Built and refined onboarding and application forms for new volunteers
Engage 100% of the 1,100+ recorded WBOR Alumni

work.name: Bowdoin College Information Technology
highlights: Assist members of 2,500-person campus community with technical requests
Generated thorough records and ticketing via the Teamdynamix ITSM system
Utilize Jamf Pro Apple management software to manage 4,500+ iPad and Mac devices
Assist in event production and provide technical support for various campus events (graduation, commencement)

work.name: LACORE Enterprises
highlights: Orchestrated comprehensive rebranding initiatives across six corporate entities, encompassing website design, on-site visual content creation, and streamlined online consistency
Strategically aligned brand vision through regular supervisor consultations, culminating in a cohesive online identity
Conducted virtual audits for accreditation bodies such as NSF and ISO (17025), while optimizing internal operations by developing in-house hiring intake forms

work.name: Northeast Photographic
highlights: Developed mastery in operating Colex and Jobo rotary film processors
Proficiency in C-41, E-6, and B&W chemical processes

volunteer.organization: McKeen Center for the Common Good
volunteer.summary: Led groups of students in community philanthropy at Maine's island communities
highlights: Engaged in work with the Maine Coast Heritage Trust, the island schools, Watermans Community Center, Vinalhaven Eldercare

volunteer.summary: Interacted with elected officials to discuss current and proposed federal and local policy

highlights: Former Historian and Board Chair
Volunteered in local community philanthropies, including Habitat for Humanity, McKinney Roots, and HUGS Cafe

volunteer.position: World Affairs Council of Dallas/Fort Worth
highlights: Steered a successful marketing initiative that garnered $15,000 in support for a demining campaign in Dimce, Kosovo, with matching contributions from two external parties, including the Princess Diana Foundation
Orchestrated sponsor communication, vendor collaboration, and strategic outreach efforts, resulting in a remarkable 31% surge in club membership through targeted physical advertisements

volunteer.summary: Volunteered in residence at a leading New England farm and apothecary
highlights: Landscaping
Horticulture
Grounds security enhancement (additional fencing, IP camera installation)

awards.title: StudentCam Grand Prize Winner
awards.summary: Produced winning documentary and was recognized on the US Congress House Floor by Congressman Van Taylor for helping to engage youth and bring awareness to the powers of citizen accountability in government
